name: Astral Adoration
description:
Once upon a time...

There lived two Elder Creatures. Admiring each other from afar, their planets' circled each other, 'round and 'round, but the gravitational pull was weaker than the Creatures' love, desperate to embrace...

Will you help build a bridge to connect our star-crossed lovers?

Keyboard

MOVE - W A S D
EXTEND goo-rope - ⬆️ UP Arrow Key
RETRACT goo-rope - ⬇️ DOWN Arrow Key

Team

Daniel Holm Larsen - Sound Design, Programmer, 
Leonora Boesen - Art Design, Programmer
Nayla Angelina Hauerberg - Art Director
Sebastian Hylander - Lead Game Designer, Lead Programmer

Game produced w/ Unity, Pixelorama, VCV Rack & Audible

Nordic GameJam 2023 Entry

Our sub-themes were...
- Elder Things
- Space Debris
- Innocence

As mostly first time jammers, we thank you for trying our game! We hope you enjoy! 💖
